Matt,
Nerikawa tsuba certainly are light and this is what is found on the massive
O-dachi that I have seen.  They actually are sometimes quite thick (around 1
cm), but it would seem that any effect on the balance of those swords would
have been negligable.
Jim

>
> they really only needed a light lacquered leather guard.

> So it stands to reason that the Nambokucho massive swords that had
